abstract: United Nations member states agree to World Health Organization plan for addressing problem of antibiotic-resistant superbugs; plan emphasizes development of new antibiotics, surveillance of resistance and better control of existing drugs.
lead_paragraph: Among other steps, the plan emphasizes the need to develop surveillance of resistance and develop mechanisms to support investment in new antibiotics.

headline.main: W.H.O. Plan Aims to Combat Resistance to Antibiotic Drugs
headline.print_headline: Europe; Switzerland: Nations Agree on Plan to Fight Resistance to Antibiotics

snippet: Among other steps, the plan emphasizes the need to develop surveillance of resistance and develop mechanisms to support investment in new antibiotics.
